android.os
类 Debug.MemoryInfo

java.lang.Object
  android.os.Debug.MemoryInfo
包容类：
Debug
public static class Debug.MemoryInfo
extends Object

This class is used to retrieved various statistics about the memory mappings for this process. The returns info broken down by dalvik, native, and other. All results are in kB.

字段摘要
 int dalvikPrivateDirty
          The private dirty pages used by dalvik.
 int dalvikPss
          The proportional set size for dalvik.
 int dalvikSharedDirty
          The shared dirty pages used by dalvik.
 int nativePrivateDirty
          The private dirty pages used by the native heap.
 int nativePss
          The proportional set size for the native heap.
 int nativeSharedDirty
          The shared dirty pages used by the native heap.
 int otherPrivateDirty
          The private dirty pages used by everything else.
 int otherPss
          The proportional set size for everything else.
 int otherSharedDirty
          The shared dirty pages used by everything else.
 
构造方法摘要
Debug.MemoryInfo()
